mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board ( title, content, writer ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{content}, #{writer} )
mapper.select: SELECT board_no AS boardNo, title, content, writer, reg_date AS regDate FROM board WHERE board_no = #{boardNo}
SELECT board_no AS boardNo, title, content, writer, reg_date AS regDate FROM board WHERE board_no > 0 ORDER BY board_no DESC, reg_date DESC
